name: Slackus Sample
description: Disqus monitor and notification sender to Slack

SLACKUS_DISQUS_FORUM.description: Disqus forum(s) to check, specified by shortname, comma separated.

SLACKUS_SLACK_WEBHOOK.description: URL of your Incoming WebHook in Slack.

SLACKUS_INTERVAL.description: Number of seconds between each check (default 60).

SLACKUS_DISQUS_LIMIT.description: The number of recent comments to check (default 25, max 100).

SLACKUS_SLACK_MENTION.description: Users in Slack channel to mention when notification arrives, comma separated.
